name: Pattern POP
description: The Pattern POP is a generator that makes simple line strip shapes using elementary math functions in X, Y and Z. Alternately it can add a new attribute to an input POP using the elementary math functions.

parameters.name: P
parameters.label: Number of Points
parameters.description: Configure Number of Points for the operator

options.label: sRGB
options.description: sRGB color space, with sRGB transfer function. Considered an SDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: sRGB - Linear
options.description: LinearÂ srgblinear - sRGB color space, with linear transfer function. Considered an SDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: Rec.601 (NTSC)
options.description: Rec.601 with NTSC primaries color space, with Rec.601 transfer function. Considered an SDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: Rec.709
options.description: Rec.709 color space, with Rec.709 (same as Rec.2020) transfer function. Considered an SDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: Rec.2020
options.description: Rec.2020 color space, with Rec.2020 (same as Rec.709) transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: DCI-P3
options.description: P3Â dcip3 - DCI-P3 color space, with D65 white point and 2.6 gamma transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: DCI-P3 (D60)
options.description: P3 (D60)Â dcip3d60 - DCI-P3 "D60 sim" color space, with D60 white point, and 2.6 gamma transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: Display-P3 (D65)
options.description: P3 (D65)Â displayp3d65 - Display-P3 color space, with D65 white point, and sRGB gamma transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: ACES2065-1
options.description: 1Â aces2065-1 - ACES 2065-1 (also known as ACES AP0) color space, with a linear gamma transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: ACEScg
options.description: ACEScg (also known as ACES AP1) color space, with a linear gamma transfer function. Considered an HDR color space with respect to Reference White.

options.label: Passthrough
options.description: When selected, the color values will be used as-is in the operation, without any modification or attempt to convert them into the Working Color Space.

options.label: Default For Color Space
options.description: Will use either the SDR or the HDR Reference White, based on the color space selected.

options.label: Standard (SDR)
options.description: Will treat the Parameter Color Space as SDR for it's reference white value.

options.label: High (HDR)
options.description: Will treat the Parameter Color Space as HDR for it's reference white value.
